title: Corda dynamic member registration context schema
description: Definition of the registration context required for registering a member in a dynamic group.

^corda.endpoints.[0-9]+.connectionURL$.description: The P2P connection URL. Can be multiple specified by index.

^corda.endpoints.[0-9]+.protocolVersion$.description: The P2P URL protocol version. Can be multiple specified by index.

^corda.roles.[0-9]+$.description: The member roles. Can be multiple specified by index.

^corda.notary.keys.[0-9]+.id$.description: The notary public key IDs which should be used for notary signing. Can be multiple specified by index.

^corda.notary.keys.[0-9]+.signature.spec.description: Optional. The notary public key signature spec. Can be multiple specified by index.

^corda.ledger.keys.[0-9]+.id$.description: The ledger public key IDs which should be used for ledger signing. Can be multiple specified by index.

^corda.ledger.keys.[0-9]+.signature.spec.description: Optional. The ledger public key signature spec. Can be multiple specified by index.

corda.session.key.id.description: The session public key ID which should be used for session initiation.

corda.session.key.signature.spec.description: Optional. The session key signature spec.

corda.notary.service.name.description: The notary service X500 name. Valid only when one of the roles is notary.

corda.notary.service.plugin.description: The notary plugin type (FQN of notary service plugin class). Valid only when one of the roles is notary.
